description: Build an analytics layer on the Chinook music store database: create a materialized view for monthly revenue, customer analytics with segmentation, genre rankings by country with window functions, a customer recommendation function, an audit trigger, and performance indexes.

meta_data.stateContent: Chinook music store database with standard schema: Customer, Invoice, InvoiceLine, Track, Genre, Album, Artist, Employee, MediaType, Playlist, PlaylistTrack. 59 customers, 412 invoices, 2240 invoice lines, 3503 tracks, 25 genres, 347 albums, 275 artists.
